entry.title: Special Weather Statement issued January 18 at 3:43PM CST by NWS
entry.summary: ...DANGEROUS ROAD CONDITIONS EXPECTED TONIGHT INTO THE UPCOMING WEEKEND... A combination of lingering frozen precipitation on area roads and a return of arctic air tonight will freeze any precipitation on surfaces until temperatures warm above freezing later Sunday. Black ice will be a major concern where any refreezing occurs.

entry.title: Special Weather Statement issued January 18 at 3:43PM CST by NWS
entry.summary: ...DANGEROUS ROAD CONDITIONS EXPECTED TONIGHT INTO THE UPCOMING WEEKEND... A combination of lingering frozen precipitation on area roads and a return of arctic air tonight will freeze any precipitation on surfaces until temperatures warm above freezing later Sunday. Black ice will be a major concern where any refreezing occurs.

entry.summary: ...DANGEROUS ROAD CONDITIONS EXPECTED TONIGHT INTO THE UPCOMING WEEKEND...
